name: Climb To Light
description:
You awaken at the bottom of a pit as a skeleton. Your death remains in the past but the surface may lead to another future?

Gameplay

- Third-person adventure/exploration

- No combat/Non-violent

- Collect resources and craft some basic platforming tools

Controls

WASD - Player controls

Mouse - Control Camera/Cursor

Q - Open equipment menu (equipment selection mode)

E - Grab ledge (when in range/applicable)

Space - Jump

Esc/Tab - Pause

Equipment Controls

Left Click - place equipment (when in equipment placement mode)

Right Click - cancel equipment placement

X - While in equipment selection mode to destroy existing equipment

Made with Unreal Engine 4
